articles.title: Trade Desk Sentiment Collapses as Specter of Amazon Looms - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Trade Desk Inc. analysts are bailing on the one-time market favorite amid growing fears that its advertising technology will get steamrolled by Amazon.com Inc.’s offerings.
articles.content:
